Description: A stab attack that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Sword_Attack_Stab.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font> our target.

Reverse Stab now has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

On a successful hit with Reverse Stab, all other sword <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font> are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Sword_ReverseStab_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per ability use.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Sword_Attack_Spin.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage to all foes within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2m</font>.

Whirling Blade inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_WhirlingBlade_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}% rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_WhirlingBlade_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Rend reduces target's defense.)</font>

Whirling Blade reduces its own <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Sword_WhirlingBlade_CDR.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> for each enemy hit.

Leap forward, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Sword_Attack_Charge.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> your target.

If you hit a foe below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Sword_LeapingStrike_Extra.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Sword_LeapingStrike_Extra.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage.

On successful hit, inflict a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_LeapingStrike_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_LeapingStrike_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Successful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heavy attacks</font> grant you {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_DmgOnHeavy.DMGStandard * 100]}% <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_DmgOnHeavy.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Empower increases damage.)</font>

The <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">final attack</font> in your light attack chain inflicts a {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_SlowOnFinal.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_SlowOnFinal.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Sword and shield <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">critical strike chance</font> increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_Crit.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.
Successfully hitting with a heavy attack causes you to lose <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1 debuff</font>.

Move <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_HasteWhileBlock.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> faster while <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">blocking</font>.

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">block</font> an attack, gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Sword_CounterAttack.DMGStandard * 100]}% empower</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Sword_CounterAttack.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Empower increases damage.) (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Sword_CounterAttack.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_DmgVsStunned.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font> foes.

On critical, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_HasteOnCrit.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_HasteOnCrit.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>
While health is full, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Swordmaster_DmgWhileFull.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage.

While holding a sword, the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">damage</font> of all group members is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Sword_Leadership.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>.

Deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.OH_Shield_Attack_Bash.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font>
 and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stunning</font> foes in front of you for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Sword_ShieldBash_Stun2.BaseDuration]}s</font>. 

This ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) 

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.OH_Shield_Attack_Bash.TauntDuration]}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

Shield Bash causes greatly increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">threat</font> and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100%</font> more damage.
Shield Bash stun <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">duration</font> increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font>.

Rush forward <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushing back</font> foes. This attack deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.OH_Shield_Attack_Rush.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.\n\nThis ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

On a successful hit, all enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font> are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weakened {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_Rush_Weak.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_Rush_Weak.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Weaken reduces target's outgoing damage.)</font>

On a successful hit, all enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font> of you are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_Rush_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Sword_Rush_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

For <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">8s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reduce</font> the incoming base <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">damage</font> from attackers by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Ability_Sword_FinalStand.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>. 

This ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.OH_Shield_FinalStand.TauntDuration]}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

If your health is above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font>, damage reduction is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Sword_FinalStand_ArmorAboveHalf.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>.

When Defender's Resolve ends, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Sword_FinalStand_Heal_Heal.HealthModifierPercent * 100]}%</font> of your max health.
Grants an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Defender_Armor.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> physical armor.

Stamina damage is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Defender_MeleeBlock.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> when blocking a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">melee</font> attack with a shield.
Reduce damage from all magical types by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Defender_EleArmor.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>.

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">block</font> an attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Defender_FortWhileBlock.ABSStandard * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Defender_FortWhileBlock.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify reduces incoming damage.)</font>

Stamina damage is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Defender_RngBlock.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> when blocking a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">ranged</font> attack with a shield.

When you block with a shield, all sword and shield cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Defender_CDRWhileBlock.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

The third attack in your light attack chain deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SwordAbilityTable.Passive_Sword_Defender_DmgOnFinal.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage and causes more <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">threat</font>.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Sword_Defender_StaminaGain.Stamina]} stamina</font> when hitting a target with Shield Bash or Shield Rush.

All incoming <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healing and regeneration</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Sword_10pcntHealing.HealMod * 100]}%</font>.

While blocking, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reduce damage</font> to all allies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2m</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Sword_Defender.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown 1s.)</font>
